title: Sweet-Soy Glazed Salmon
about: This simple baked salmon is smothered with an easy ingredient salty-sweet glaze and is ready in under 30 minutes!

ingredients: 1 tbsp oyster sauce (I prefer Worcestershire sauce)
1 tsp fresh ginger, peeled and minced
instructions: Place the salmon in an oven-proof glass container. Top with the soy sauce, oyster sauce, honey, sesame oil, and red pepper flakes. Leave to marinate until oven is heated.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through. Top the salmon with white sesame and parsley, serve immediately.
